recipe.title: Radishes with Herbed Salt and Olive Oil
ingredients: 1 small garlic clove, very finely minced or pushed through a garlic press (optional)
2 pounds radishes (about 2 dozen), trimmed and halved
instructions: Combine garlic (if using), chives, parsley, tarragon, oregano, lemon zest, and peppercorns in a small mixing bowl. Stir in salt and transfer herbed salt to a serving bowl. Pour oil into another small bowl. Serve radishes with oil and herbed salt for dipping.
